# mixedelnet

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An R package for fitting high dimensional linear mixed-effects models with elastic-net penalty

## Installation

You can install the development version of mixedelnet from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("AndreaCappozzo/mixedelnet")
```
